backend/main.mo: Main canister implementing user profiles, habits, records, monthly targets, and authorization‑protected CRUD logic.
backend/migration.mo: No‑op migration module passing version 18 state through unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Precomputed summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose and version‑18 behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme definitions providing OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level app with hardened startup logic choosing login, profile setup, or dashboard and wrapped in an ErrorBoundary.
frontend/src/components/CollapsibleHabit: UI panel that toggles open to reveal the HabitManager component.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary capturing render errors and showing a custom fallback.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorFallba: Full‑screen fatal error UI showing error details with reload and retry options.
frontend/src/components/HabitGrid.tsx: Renders a calendar-style grid for habits, showing daily completion and amount editing with mutation-based updates.
frontend/src/components/HabitManager.tsx: Provides UI and logic to create, edit, and delete habits, including unit and default amount handling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with branding, user greeting, and logout menu.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Shows the login UI using Internet Identity with branding and loading states.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyTargetsEd: Calculates and displays monthly totals for applicable habits based on completed records.
frontend/src/components/MonthTabs.tsx: Horizontal tab list for switching between months.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form for creating a user profile by submitting a name to backend storage.
frontend/src/components/ProgressCharts.t: Generates monthly progress visuals including pie, bar, and line charts using computed habit statistics.
frontend/src/components/TrackerDashboard: Main dashboard component that loads habits and records, manages month selection, and renders habit manager, targets editor, grid, and charts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for loading and mutating habits, records, and user profiles via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, sets up react-query, and wraps the app with the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty type declaration file reserved for jsPDF typings.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Parses free‑text durations into seconds, formats seconds into readable strings, and validates duration inputs.
frontend/src/utils/fileDownload.ts: Generates standardized filenames for CSV or PDF exports based on date ranges.
frontend/src/utils/habitUnit.ts: Utility helpers for creating, identifying, and labeling habit units, including custom and time-based units.
frontend/src/utils/reportCsv.ts: Generates a CSV export of habit data and triggers file download.
frontend/src/utils/reportDateRange.ts: Provides helpers for converting dates to UTC components and formatting date ranges.
frontend/src/utils/reportPdf.ts: Empty placeholder file for PDF report utilities.
frontend/src/utils/reportStats.ts: Calculates habit, daily, and volume statistics for a reporting period.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, features, architecture notes, and known issues for the habit tracker app.
